page.title: 10Home Life : A Day at Home
page.content: It is Saturday morning at about 10:45. I get up out of bed go down stairs and feed my Hamster. Then I switch on the TV. About 10 minutes later mum and dad came down stairs. My mum makes me my breakfast. I have Ricecrispies or Weetabix. I eat it in the living room while I watch TV, when I've finished I turn off the TV and go upstairs to get dressed. After that my sister's friend comes, my sister Caroline comes down stairs and invites her friend Alison in while she gets ready to go to Bromley. After she has gone I knock for my friend David and then he comes back round to my house. We get my hamster Cuddles out and let him run around and then put him back in his cage, I also have a cat called Sooty and a rabbit called Flopsy. Then we play wall ball. At 8pm David went home and my sister comes home from Allisons
